ctags.name: BACK_OFF_REPEATING_TASK_TYPE
ctags.pattern: /^    BACK_OFF_REPEATING_TASK_TYPE        \/\/ back off repeating task type$/

ctags.name: FIXED_RATE_REPEATING_TASK_TYPE
ctags.pattern: /^    FIXED_RATE_REPEATING_TASK_TYPE,     \/\/ fixed rate repeating task type$/

ctags.name: NORMAL_REPEATING_TASK_TYPE
ctags.pattern: /^    NORMAL_REPEATING_TASK_TYPE,         \/\/ basic repeating task type$/

ctags.name: REPEAT_TASK_CANCELED
ctags.pattern: /^    REPEAT_TASK_CANCELED,       \/\/ signal a 'stop waiting', returns to IDLE$/

ctags.name: REPEAT_TASK_IDLE
ctags.pattern: /^    REPEAT_TASK_IDLE,           \/\/ prior to 'wait'$/

ctags.name: REPEAT_TASK_RUNNING
ctags.pattern: /^    REPEAT_TASK_RUNNING,        \/\/ executing callback function$/

ctags.name: REPEAT_TASK_SHORT_CIRCUIT
ctags.pattern: /^    REPEAT_TASK_SHORT_CIRCUIT   \/\/ signal to run again immediately$/

ctags.name: REPEAT_TASK_WAITING
ctags.pattern: /^    REPEAT_TASK_WAITING,        \/\/ waiting for time to expire$/

ctags.name: TASK_MTX
ctags.pattern: /^static pthread_mutex_t  TASK_MTX = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;$/

ctags.name: _repeatTask
ctags.pattern: /^typedef struct _repeatTask$/

ctags.name: arg
ctags.pattern: /^    void                            *arg;                   \/\/ optional arg supplied by caller$/

ctags.name: assignHandle
ctags.pattern: /^static uint32_t assignHandle()$/

ctags.pattern: /^static void calcTimeToPause(struct timespec *executeTime, struct timespec *pauseTime)$/

ctags.name: callback
ctags.pattern: /^    taskCallbackFunc                callback;               \/\/ function to execute after the d/

ctags.name: cancelRepeatingTask
ctags.pattern: /^void *cancelRepeatingTask(uint32_t task)$/

ctags.name: createRepeatingTask
ctags.pattern: /^uint32_t createRepeatingTask(uint64_t delayAmount, delayUnits units, taskCallbackFunc func, void/

ctags.name: currentDelay
ctags.pattern: /^    uint64_t                        currentDelay;           \/\/ the delay amount, might change /

ctags.pattern: /^static bool findRepeatTaskByHandle(void *searchVal, void *item)$/

ctags.pattern: /^    struct timespec                 targetRunTime;          \/\/ Time when we want to execute ne/

ctags.name: taskType
